    • Method Detail

      • setGlowing

        public static void setGlowing(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                              GlowAPI.Color color,
                              String tagVisibility,
                              String push,
                              org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver)
        Set the glowing-color of an entity
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to update
        color - GlowAPI.Color of the glow, or null to stop glowing
        tagVisibility - visibility of the name-tag (always, hideForOtherTeams, hideForOwnTeam, never)
        push - push behaviour (always, pushOtherTeams, pushOwnTeam, never)
        receiver - Player that will see the update

                              boolean glowing,
                              org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver)
        Set the glowing-color of an entity
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to update
        glowing - whether the entity is glowing or not

      • isGlowing

        public static boolean isGlowing(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver)
        Check if an entity is glowing
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to check
        receiver - Player receiver to check (as used in the setGlowing methods)
        Returns:
        true if the entity appears glowing to the player

      • isGlowing

        public static boolean isGlowing(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                Collection<? extends org.bukkit.entity.Player> receivers,
                                boolean checkAll)
        Checks if an entity is glowing
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to check
        receivers - Collection of Player receivers to check
        checkAll - if true, this only returns true if the entity is glowing for all receivers; if false this returns true if the entity is glowing for any of the receivers
        Returns:
        true if the entity appears glowing to the players

      • getGlowColor

        public static GlowAPI.Color getGlowColor(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver)
        Get the glow-color of an entity
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to get the color for
        receiver - Player receiver of the color (as used in the setGlowing methods)
        Returns:
        the GlowAPI.Color, or null if the entity doesn't appear glowing to the player
